item.description: Be sure to come and bring your friends. Enjoy the evening and dance the night away to our great DJ - D&J Productions. There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy. This is our first dance after the holidays. Come and join us! Dress to impress and door prizes. Adm. $17. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I 84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right. Parking both sides of building.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission's table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Snowflake Dance
